mapper.sql: /*[BaseTdspMnPop.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT MN_POP_SEQ , POP_TP_CD , POP_NM , BKG_TP_CD , TOP_TXT , MID_TXT , BTM_TXT , IMG_PTH , OGNL_IMG_NM , POP_CTS , POP_KD_CD , POP_URL , ST_DTTM , ED_DTTM , SRT_SQN , DSPLY_YN , FRNT_YN , SYS_CD , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TDSP_MN_POP WHERE MN_POP_SEQ = #{mn_pop_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: /* [TdspMnPop.xml][selectTdspMnPopList][메인화면 팝업 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT MN_POP_SEQ ,POP_TP_CD ,BKG_TP_CD ,POP_NM ,TOP_TXT ,MID_TXT ,BTM_TXT ,IMG_PTH ,POP_CTS ,POP_KD_CD ,POP_URL ,ST_DTTM ,ED_DTTM ,SRT_SQN ,DSPLY_YN ,FRNT_YN FROM TDSP_MN_POP WHERE DSPLY_YN = 'Y' AND FRNT_YN = #{frnt_yn ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYSDATE() BETWEEN ST_DTTM AND ED_DTTM ORDER BY SRT_SQN

/* [TdspMnPop.xml][selectTdspMnPopInfo][메인 팝업 상세 정보 조회][TANINE] */ SELECT MP.MN_POP_SEQ , MP.POP_TP_CD , MP.BKG_TP_CD , MP.POP_NM , MP.TOP_TXT , MP.MID_TXT , MP.BTM_TXT , MP.IMG_PTH , MP.OGNL_IMG_NM , MP.POP_CTS , MP.POP_KD_CD , MP.POP_URL , MP.ST_DTTM , MP.ED_DTTM , MP.SRT_SQN , MP.DSPLY_YN , MP.CRTR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(MP.CRT_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') AS F_CRT_DTTM FROM TDSP_MN_POP MP WHERE MN_POP_SEQ = #{mn_pop_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
